attributes.action: ban lorries from over taking on public highways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The reason for this is they overtake on busy roads nearly hitting cars in the fast lane then slow down the steady move of traffic down from 70mph to 50mph causing people to have to brake hard and try and control their car as the lorry nearly forces them off the road!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
